hero.title1: Mental health is a right. Everywhere.
hero.text1: For over 20 years, we have supported those without access to psychological care.
hero.title2: Mental care is inaccessible for millions.
hero.text2: Cost, distance or stigma make mental health care out of reach. We go where no one else does.
hero.title3: We are here, with and for them.
hero.text3: Our psychologists deploy in emergencies or long-term to create a human, confidential and free space of care.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: At Brealth, our mission is to make mental health care accessible to everyone, everywhere in the world. We firmly believe that mental health is a fundamental right, regardless of geographic, economic, or social situation.
mission.p2: For over 20 years, our teams have worked tirelessly to provide psychological support to vulnerable and marginalized populations. We intervene in conflict zones, refugee camps, remote regions, and underserved neighborhoods where mental health services are limited or nonexistent.

actions.title: Our Actions
actions.intro: Our work is based on three main pillars to ensure a lasting and meaningful impact:

card1.title: Emergency response
card1.text: Rapid deployment of psychologists to areas affected by natural disasters, conflicts, or humanitarian crises to provide immediate support.

card2.title: Sustainable programs
card2.text: Establishment of permanent care centers and training of local professionals to ensure continuity of mental health services.

card3.title: Awareness
card3.text: Information and education campaigns to combat the stigma of mental illness and promote the importance of psychological well-being.

actions.stats: In 2024, our teams are active in 27 countries around the world and have supported more than 50,000 people toward better mental health.

help.title: Help Us
help.intro: Your support is essential for us to continue and expand our work. There are several ways you can contribute to our mission:
help.item1: Make a one-time or recurring donation
help.item2: Become a volunteer or offer your professional services
help.item3: Take part in our awareness events
help.item4: Share our campaigns on social media
help.item5: Organize a fundraiser in your company or community
help.conclusion: Every contribution, whatever its form, makes a real difference in the lives of the people we support.
